version_description:
* Fixed an issue where some people were unable to select pictures
* Fixed an issue where the email view occasionally wouldn't appear for backups

* Fixed an issue where some people were unable to select pictures
* Fixed an issue where the email view occasionally wouldn't appear for backups

* Fixed an issue where some people were unable to select pictures
* Fixed an issue where the email view occasionally wouldn't appear for backups

* Updates to iPad to support multitasking (Slide Over and Split View) on iOS 9
* Landscape mode supported for views on iPhone
* Enhancements to Touch ID on IOS 9
* Picture card now also displays notes
* Improved local WiFi syncing with Mac OS X version
* Font size increased in key areas
* Miscellaneous fixes and enhancements

* Updates to iPad to support multitasking (Slide Over and Split View) on iOS 9
* Landscape mode supported for views on iPhone
* Enhancements to Touch ID on IOS 9
* Picture card now also displays notes
* Improved local WiFi syncing with Mac OS X version
* Font size increased in key areas
* Miscellaneous fixes and enhancements

eWallet 8.3 includes an upgraded wallet file format that has the following benefits on all platforms:
* Improved wallet security
* Improved support for non-English characters in category names
* Support for moving forward with additional wallet features

In addition, eWallet 8.3 for iOS includes:
* Support of IPv6 for local Wi-Fi sync
* Speed improvement to live search
* Miscellaneous fixes and enhancements
